column4: i don't see my 65 bit acer in the list of compatable computers for ubuntu ... does this mean it's not supported .. or does this mean i should try a 32 bit install instead? ... or neither LOL
gentoo64: yeah you would think so ... gpart don't see it either
gentoo64 : sorry .. yes gpart sees the drive .. the installer don't .. sorry
i did a low level format on the drive yesterday ... installed win7 again .. no problems .. tried 2 other hdds i got laying around .. all the same
if you have installed the raid device on an hd that is excluded from the installer
if you have more than one hd the partioner ask if you want to install the raid device if you do that disc is then excluded from the installer
only one hdd in the box is wired up
and its properly detected by the bios?
use gparted to mark first partition as active
: i've tried every combination in there .. all same result
